item.title: Projects
item.description: LeetCode_Crawler Crawl submissions from LeetCode and generate a markdown file, implemented in Python3 using Scrapy framework and MongoDB. ğŸ”® ZinMark A Featured Dynamic Bookmark Website, implemented in Python3 using Django framework for back end and Bootstrap, jQuery for front end. ğŸ“Œ Scrabble Game An online multi-player Scrabble game, implemented in Java using TCP, Thread, and JavaFX. ğŸ© Machine Learning Algorithm Implementations Machine Learning algorithm implementations, implemented in Python3 and Jupyter Notebook using numpy, scipy, pandas, matplotlib, tenserflow libraries, and verified by sklearn.
